amendment.description: To make available funds for the World Health Organization?s HIV/AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria Cluster.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2019 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2019 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S13368; text: CR S13368) To make available funds for the World Health Organization?s HIV/AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria Cluster.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2019 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2019 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy.
